column2: 01) Module Number         = the number of the module whose channel these settings belong to
02) Channel Number        = the number of the channel within the module whose settings these belong to
03) Channel Enable        = T/F
04) Record Length         = Number Of Samples/8
05) Large Range           = T for 2Vpp (F for 0.5Vpp)
06) Aggregate Events      = # events in a channel aggregate (max is 1023)
07) PreTrigger            = Number Of Samples to keep before trigger / 4 (must be greater than Gate Offset by at least 38ns)
08) CFD Delay             = CFD delay time in sample units (2ns/sample for 730
09) CFD Fraction          = CFD zero point fraction (0 for 25%
10) Short Gate            = Width of short gate in samples
11) Long Gate             = Width of long gate in samples (must be larger than short gate)
12) Gate Offset           = Number of samples for the shift of the integration gate position wrt trigger
13) Trigger Threshold     = Threshold for LED or to arm the CFD (in LSB units(0.12mv in 2Vpp
14) Fixed Baseline        = Fixed Baseline value (when not using baseline mean which must be turned off)
15) Shaped Trigger Width  = num samples for the shaped trigger (8ns steps)
16) Trigger Hold Off      = time to block channel from triggering again (8ns steps)
17) PSD Threshold         = When Selecting events online (gamma or neutron)
column3: define psd limit for the selection (multiply value by 1024 and convert to int)

column2: 18) Charge Sensitivity    = charge per lsb unit (for 2Vpp: 0=5fC
19) Charge Pedestal On    = (T/F) add fixed value of 1024 to charge (useful when en close to 0)
20) DPP Trigger Counting  = 0->trig-out only reflects accepted self triggers
column3: 1->trg-out reflects all self triggers (even rejected events)

column2: 21) Discrimination Mode   = 0->Leading Edge
22) Pulse Polarity        = 0->positive pulses
23) Trigger Mode          = 0->Normal Mode (indep self trig)
column3: 1->Coincidence mode (require coincidence w val signal in shaped trigger window)

column2: 24) Baseline Mean         = # samples to avg for baseline. (0->Disable baseline(used fixed value)
25) Disable Self Trigger  = F->Self Triggering
26) PSD Cut Below Thresh  = T/F (only accept pulses below previously set psd threshold)
27) PSD Cut Above Thresh  = T/F (only accept pulses above previously set psd threshold)
28) Over Range Rejection  = T->Reject pulse if ADC value is outside ADC sample range (during long gate) F->do not reject clipped pulses
29) Trigger Hysteresis    = T->Inhibit trigger during trailing edge of a pulse F->Do not inhibit trigger in trailing edge
30) Use Local Shaped Trig = T->Enable Local Shaped Trigger use between pairs of channels (chan 0 and 1
column5: F-> Do not use Local Shaped Trigger

column2: 31) Local Shaped Trig Mode= 0->AND the two channels
32) Use Local Trig Val    = T->Enable Local Trigger Validation between pairs of channels
33) Local Trig Val mode   = 0->AND the two channels
34) Local Trig Val as Veto= T->Use use lcl trig val from mobo to veto event in couple
35) Extras Word Options   = 0->Ext tStamp and baseline*4
36) Smooth Integration    = T->Use a smoothed signal for charge integration
37) Input smoothing       = 0->Do not smooth input for cfd or led
38) DC Offset             = DC Offset for the channel in DAC LSB units (which are ADC LSB units/4)
39) Veto Duration Ext     = When veto from local trig val is enabled
column3: this can be used to extend its duration

column2: 40) Trigger Valid Mask    = Set trigger validation logic for channel
column3: see 725-730 DPP-PSD registers manual for more
